resources.string: Edge Lighting enhances your Android notification experience with beautiful, customizable lighting effects around your screen edges. This productivity app improves notification visibility and adds visual appeal without compromising privacy or performance. All processing happens locally on your device - no data is collected, stored, or transmitted to external servers.
Monitoring notifications for edge lighting effects

Edge Lighting enhances your notification experience by creating beautiful lighting effects around your screen edges. This permission allows the app to detect when new notifications arrive so it can display appropriate colored lighting effects. Your notification content is never stored or transmitted - only the arrival event and app icon are used for color extraction.

Edge Lighting needs permission to display lighting effects on top of other applications. This creates the beautiful edge lighting animation around your screen when notifications arrive. The overlay is completely transparent and only shows colored lighting - it never blocks or interferes with your normal app usage. This permission is essential for the core functionality of providing visual notification enhancements.
